## Further reading

- @gelmanData2006: Mixed model focus. Somewhat technical.
- @mcelreathStatistical2020: Starts from scratch. Some emphasis on causal analysis.
- @keryIntroduction2010, @keryBayesian2011: BUGS/ecological data analysis focused
- @kruschkeDoing2014
- @hobbsBayesian2015,@clarkModels2020
